name: media_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_100_success_instagram_api_scalable_robust.
Tool description: 750 requests a minute, 100% success rate Instagram API, any scale is supported. Need help/ custom plan? contact us on Telegram: https://t.me/apimaster10 Join the channel for updates: https://t.me/socialdataapis
API description: Retrieves information about a media item from the Instagram API.

media_id.description: The ID of the media item to retrieve information for, used as a query parameter.

mediaid.description: The ID of the media item to retrieve information for, included in the URL path.
